foia_request.request_text: Request for historical principal broker records for Kettler Management Inc. (License #0226025311) from October 31, 2014 through April 3, 2025, including all principal broker assignments, license amendments, and disciplinary actions.
foia_request.agency: Virginia Department of Professional and Occupational Regulation

legal_implications.requirement: Principal Broker must exercise active supervision of the firm's real estate activities
legal_implications.potential_penalties: Civil penalties up to $1,000 per transaction under VA Code ยง 54.1-2105.2
